column12: (Stat)* = Buffs on the troop card (e.g. "ATT+1 if troop is complete")

column17: This unit is not affected by the Block talent
This unit may re-roll 1 die from the first assault
When this unit is destroyed, draw a card
When performing a walk action, areas containing enemy units don't end this unit's movement
When this unit is destroyed, before removing it from the board, carry out a range 0 attack against the attacking unit
This unit is not affected by the Block talent
This unit ignores the first wound caused by each attack
This unit can ignore terrain effects
This unit cannot lose its talents
When using its Guard talent, this unit can retaliate for free
This unit ignores the first wound caused by each attack
If this unit is complete, it may make a 4 dice area attack in an adjacent area as an attack action
